entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, mentioned as having a row with Ron Weasley and inviting Luna to Slughorn's party.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's friend who had a row with him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being in the same group as Harry and Ron.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is a friend of Harry's who is known for speaking uncomfortable truths.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being nice to Luna and stopping boys from calling her 'Loony'.

relationships.description: Harry had a row with Ron Weasley.
Ginny protected Luna from being called 'Loony' by stopping boys in their Transfiguration class.
Harry invited Luna to Slughorn's party with him.
Ron Weasley had a row with Harry.
